FormDataAppend.summary: The append() method of the interface appends a new value onto an existing key inside a FormData object, or adds the key if it does not already exist.

remarks.para: The difference between and append() is that if the specified key already exists, set() will overwrite all existing values with the new one, whereas append() will append the new value onto the end of the existing set of values.

blockquote.para: Note: This method is available in Web Workers.
